# Security Compliance Test Document

## Overview

This test document covers security compliance requirements for integration testing.

## HIPAA Compliance

HIPAA compliance requirements include:

- Encryption of PHI at rest and in transit
- Access controls and audit logging
- Business Associate Agreements (BAAs)
- Risk assessments and security policies

## GDPR Compliance

GDPR compliance involves:

- Data protection by design
- Right to erasure implementation
- Data breach notification procedures
- Privacy impact assessments

## AWS Security Services

AWS provides these security services:

- AWS Config for compliance monitoring
- AWS CloudTrail for audit logging
- AWS GuardDuty for threat detection
- AWS Security Hub for centralized security

## Azure Security Features

Azure security features include:

- Azure Security Center for recommendations
- Azure Sentinel for SIEM capabilities
- Azure Key Vault for secrets management
- Azure AD for identity management

## Implementation Guidelines

- Implement least privilege access
- Use multi-factor authentication
- Enable comprehensive logging
- Regular security assessments
- Incident response procedures

## Monitoring and Alerting

- Set up security monitoring dashboards
- Configure automated security alerts
- Regular compliance reporting
- Vulnerability scanning

## Conclusion

This test document provides security compliance guidance for testing purposes.
